text: Gilbert Scorsoglio (born 21 July 1932) is a Monegasque former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Monegasque male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Monaco Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics
title: Gilbert Scorsoglio
